name: TRASH NEXUS
description:
Trash Nexus is a Fast paced third person shooter set in a cyberpunk Panda dystopia.

Story:

Red Pandas are looking to finally establish themselves in the Bear Market.  As the most desolate and undefended of the factions, the Raccoon country of The Lid is their prime target for replacement.

So, that’s where you come in, recruit.

As the newest recruit to the Bin Service Patrol (BSP), you will be responsible for protecting The Lid from invaders.

Your mission is to sabotage the Red Panda warfront and save your homeland.  

Intercept a brutal and adorable invasion of the Food Reclamation Center.  Deployment starts now.

Go out and give ‘em some garbage.

Controls: 

WASD keys - movement

Mouse Left click - shoot

Mouse Right click - Aim

F key - Grapple.

Space key - Jump

C - Answer Codec
